column4: i just installed ubuntu and found list of problems, can anyone explain them to me?
latest
stable i believe
unsure what you mean
it does the first loading screen
then i gt command line
i type /var/log/Xorg.0.log in and got a list of WW's and a EE
try typing: startx
do you remember what the EE line said?
did you get a blue screen complaining about X stuff?
sudo nano /etc/X11/xorg.conf

yes do that first to open up a file you need to edit.  scroll down to Section "Device" then change the driver to "vesa".  exit by pressing ctrl+x, say yes to save, *then* type startx when you get back to the prompt
hopefully you'll get a gui after you do that.
there seems to be then one divice option i can chnage
look for the one w/ the video device
i just change the setion "device" driver from ati to Vesa with no luck running startx
captial V?
yes
EE failed to load module Vesa
it needs to be lower
many thanks i made it to the ubuntu gui
thanks again great help
